main event: A tower operator reported seeing a light in the sky over Jacksonville, Florida, which was thought to be a satellite.
interesting points: The object appeared as a stationary light, about the size of a star., The observer noted it was white in color., It was believed to be tracking west to east., The observation lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The size of the object was estimated to be 500-600 feet in diameter with colored lights surrounding it.
sighted object: a stationary white light in the sky
witness description: Jackie Faris, a 33-year-old male tower operator from Daytona Beach, Florida
